meanings.definition: A game played on a large open-air course, in which a small hard ball is struck with a club into a series of small holes in the ground.
meanings.sent1: During the weekend, my family enjoys playing gowf together at the local course.
meanings.sent2: Many people find gowf to be a relaxing and challenging sport.
meanings.sent3: I tried playing gowf with a broomstick and a tennis ball, but it didn't quite work out.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, networking is like playing a strategic game of gowf.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the gowf ball hitting the hole is so satisfying.

meanings.definition: To play the game of golf.
meanings.sent1: Let's gowf this Saturday morning before it gets too hot.
meanings.sent2: He gowfs every Sunday with his friends at the local course.
meanings.sent3: She gowfs so well that she could probably teach a class on it.
meanings.sent4: When life throws challenges at you, remember to gowf through them with determination.
meanings.sent5: Gowfing under the clear blue sky is a wonderful way to spend the day.
